channel.title: online on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in online on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-13
item.description: ‘Unleashed’ Apple Event Focusing on New Macs to Take Place on October 18 (2 minute read) Apple will be holding its Unleashed event on October 18 at 10 am Pacific Time at the Steve Jobs Theater on the Apple Park campus in Cupertino.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-24
item.description: Nintendo Switch Online is getting an ‘expansion pack’ with N64 and Genesis games (1 minute read) The Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack will let Nintendo Switch Online members play Nintendo 64 and Sega Genesis games.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-31
item.description: PayPal is exploring a stock-trading platform for its U.S. customers (3 minute read) PayPal is exploring ways to let users trade individual stocks.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-02
item.description: Supposed Google Health app leak shows early interface (2 minute read) Screenshots from the upcoming Google Health app have been leaked online.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-21
item.description: Snap’s new Spectacles let you see the world in augmented reality (4 minute read) Snap has unveiled its first true augmented reality glasses.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-15
item.description: Zoom is releasing a new tool to let paid users charge for admission to online events like conferences or fitness classes (3 minute read) OnZoom is Zoom’s new online event hosting platform.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-09
item.description: This is Tinder’s new video chat feature, Face to Face (4 minute read) Tinder has introduced a new video call feature called Face to Face in 13 countries, including several regions in the US, Australia, Brazil, and France.
